result.eng: Put those things in order according to size.
result.ga: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.orig: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.html: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.
result.ponchtml: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.

result.eng: The theory is wrong, according to the experts.
result.ga: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaithe
result.orig: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaithe
result.html: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaitheThe theory is wrong, according to the experts.
result.ponchtml: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaiṫeThe theory is wrong, according to the experts.

result.eng: According to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.
result.ga: Dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoire
result.orig: Dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoire
result.html: Dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoireAccording to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis na coṁarsana tá siad imiṫe ar saoireAccording to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.

result.eng: According to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ga: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.orig: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé

result.ponchtml: Dar leis an ollaṁ níl sé soiléir in aon ċor cén fáṫ ar ṫarla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
